components.name: Streamlit Application
components.description: The frontend application built using Streamlit that interacts with users and displays the UI.

components.name: Authentication Controller
components.description: Handles user authentication logic, including login, logout, and session management.

components.name: Cookie Model
components.description: Manages the creation and validation of authentication cookies for session persistence.

components.name: OAuth2 Models
components.description: Handles OAuth2 authentication flows for third-party services like Google and Microsoft.

components.name: Configuration File
components.description: Stores user credentials and application settings in a YAML format, including hashed passwords.

data_flows.description: User credentials are sent from the Streamlit application to the Authentication Controller for verification.
Upon successful authentication, the Authentication Controller instructs the Cookie Model to create a session cookie.
The application redirects users to OAuth2 providers for authentication when using third-party login.

trust_boundaries.name: User Authentication Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary that separates user input and authentication processes from the application logic.

trust_boundaries.name: External OAuth2 Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary that separates the application from external OAuth2 providers.
